attributes.action: We demand the disbanding of the House of Lords if they try to thwart Brexit.
attributes.background: A referendum -  was held on Thursday 23 June, to decide whether the UK should leave or remain in the European Union. Leave won by 52% to 48%. The referendum turnout was 71.8%, with more than 30 million people voting.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178288
